Entries.Maru: #$c .5#Strange that it's raining in winter.$s#We didn't used to get rain in winter like this. Dad says this might be due to climate change.$s#

Entries.1{{YearRemainder}}: Saw a really interesting paper out of %name group on bipedal robots the other day!#$b#They've got a new algorithm to help the robot keep its balance.
Entries.2{{YearRemainder}}: One of the difficulties of creating a good robotic limb is just power management. Batteries can be quite heavy.$s
Entries.3{{YearRemainder}}: I wish I had a better relationship with my brother. Think of all the things we could build together!
Entries.4{{YearRemainder}}: Penny and I spent yesterday building robots with the kids. It's a fun little science project to do with them.
Entries.5{{YearRemainder}}: Harvey pays me pretty well, and lets me read when there isn't any other work to do.$h
Entries.6{{YearRemainder}}: There's a lot more paperwork that goes on in a doctor's office than I would have thought when I started this job.$s
Entries.7{{YearRemainder}}: The fax machine at work broke. Do you know how expensive it is to get someone out here to fix a fax machine?$s

Entries.1: @, why did you decide to come to Pelican Town?
Entries.1_2: Ah, @, it's the start of a new month! What do you have planned?
Entries.2_2: Since my dad works there, I can audit classes at Grampleton University for free.#$b#It's fun taking classes in new things!
Entries.8_2: Sometimes I wonder if Sebastian would be happier living in the city.#$b#He doesn't really like living with other people though.
Entries.9_2: I like working at the clinic. Dad says I should be doing more with my life, though.
Entries.11_2: Mom wishes she could have sent Sebastian to college. She says....no, never mind.
Entries.13_2: Say, @, you planting anything interesting on that farm of yours?
Entries.14_2: Dad? Dad's an ecologist. He's partnered with Grampleton University.
Entries.15_2: I really enjoy building things. Not sure where I'm going with my current project, but it's sure fun to just play around.
Entries.17_2: Dad bought me unleaded solder. It's really not the same.
Entries.19_2: I wish I got along better with my brother.$s
Entries.20_2: Do you have any fresh strawberries? Penny and I are thinking of doing a DNA extraction with the kids. Fun little kitchen science experiment.#$b#Strawberries are best because they're hexaploid, so they have a lot of DNA you can extract.$h

Entries.{{TheMightyAmondee.CustomTokens/Annivers: Oh, honey, it's our anniversary today! Wanna go do something fun?$h
